name: ChapterX
introduce: ChapterX is an immersive 3D platform for projects to build, connect, and interact with their communities on Solana, Ethereum, and BNB Chain. It allows users to create unique profiles, projects to build worlds, and NFT holders to seamlessly create 3D avatars based on their existing NFTs. ChapterX is focused on providing utility and building a revolutionary community for the Web3 space through a social metaverse. It is transforming 2D text-based engagement into a 3D immersive experience.
